body:
Already admina abusing powers of guilds, modding themselves to censor sub. Being absolute pussies towards reddit AHS/discord faggots, if not out right favoring and helping them vandalize the site and guilds. Shit like a 'slur filter' to censor 'no no words' shows a cucked mindset. 

With the downing of Voat I'm sure someone out there working on replacement to fill that void. If not more .win communities might be preferable to ruqqus going forward. I'm not gonna bring anymore content here in hopes of it growing.

title: So the admins have already shown they do not have the right temperament or mindset to run a free speech platform. Where to next?

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

body:
Try notabug.io or poal.co or lemmy. Federated websites with as little moderation as possible. There's barely any users but there can't be any unless more people join.

Also getcomet.net seems pretty good but be aware they have a stricter content policy.
body_html:
Try notabug.io or poal.co or lemmy. Federated websites with as little moderation as possible. There's barely any users but there can't be any unless more people join.

Also getcomet.net seems pretty good but be aware they have a stricter content policy.

guild.description:
Documenting guilds that have been hijacked—changed significantly to where they no longer represent their original purpose.

To guildmasters: the best way to prevent sieging is to have multiple guildmasters or at least one other guildmaster. Always make sure to appoint a successor to your guild you can trust. Preventing sieging is important for maintaining your guild.

Related guild: +SiegedGuilds
___
Founder: @Xigbar68

Related guild: +SiegedGuilds

Founder: @Xigbar68
guild.name: HijackedGuilds

body: It seems poal.co is the goto for now. On this subject: Even if I find a particular topic or language objectionable, I find censorship infinitely more objectionable.
